titles.title: This Is the Day the Lord Has Made

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Today he rose and left the dead, and Satan's empire fell; today the saints His triumphs spread, and all His wonders tell.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hosanna to th'anointed King, to David's holy Son. help us, O LORD, descend and bring salvation from Your throne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blest be the Lord, who comes to us with messages of grace; who comes, in God His Father's name, to save our sinful race.
